ticket.title: CI guardrails: ban NoOpVerifier in default builds; enforce RFC-0028/0029 fields present in execution receipts

in_scope: Add compile-time/CI checks that `NoOpVerifier` is not used in default mode.
Add integration tests asserting: execution receipts include RFC-0028 boundary + RFC-0029 admission traces.
Add tests asserting: jobs without broker token are denied/quarantined.

steps: Add feature flags if needed: `--features unsafe_no_verify` only for dev/testing.
Add CI checks and minimal end-to-end harness.

criteria: A PR that reintroduces NoOpVerifier or omits RFC-0028/0029 receipt fields fails CI.
